episode_summary: This episode of 'No Such Thing As A Fish' features facts about the first man to swim the English Channel, the first item sold on eBay, Alexander Fleming's unique thank you gift, and an unusual early ice cream recipe. The hosts discuss historical swimming feats, the origins of eBay, the discovery of penicillin, and the use of ambergris in ice cream.

facts.fact: The first man to swim the English Channel later had a show where he floated in a tank for two hours.
The first item sold on eBay was a broken laser pointer.
When Alexander Fleming's neighbors foiled a burglary at his house, as a thank you gift, he gave them some mold.
The earliest known ice cream recipe suggests flavoring with poo.
